description: This file sets up an agent with memory and session summarization capabilities, makes several responses, and prints messages and session summaries.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of generating responses, maintaining memory, and summarizing sessions.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Handles storage and retrieval of conversation messages and session summaries.

classes.name: SessionSummarizer
classes.description: Generates summarized versions of conversation sessions.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used for generating responses.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent, optionally streaming the output.

methods.name: get_messages_for_session
methods.description: Retrieves the list of messages in the current session.

methods.name: get_session_summary
methods.description: Retrieves the summary of the current session.
